description.0: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

0.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>48</cryo>.

1.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>15%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>60</cryo>.

2.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>18%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>72</cryo>.

3.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>21%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>84</cryo>.

4.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>96</cryo>.
